commit.title: (Partially) Revert "Make Environ.globals abstract."
commit.message:
(Partially) Revert "Make Environ.globals abstract."

This reverts commit 3984f3c1db51f7b788ad49eafb7647774e8d1f53.

This broke clients wanting to inspect the enviroment, see
https://github.com/coq/coq/pull/7745#issuecomment-411597610

Additionally, this opaqueness "pattern" for private records clutters
the API and prevents some useful patterns such as checking of
exhaustive pattern records.
